name: Alvaro Masin
description: I am in every sense a Gentleman I am easy going, down to earth and God fearing.I am a sweet, fun loving man and gentle hearted man; I enjoy rollerblading along the beaches on beautiful sunny days. I enjoy doing things that are thrilling and exciting. I believe in taking care of a woman and treating her as a gift that God meant her to be. I am very romantic and I like to pay a lot of attention to my woman. I also like to give her compliments and tell her how nice looking she is and how much I love and care for her. I am a very good communicator and I love to talk things over. I hate to argue, and I am a very honest and caring man. I like to laugh and have fun. I’m a man who knows how to be a partner not a dictator. Stand beside his woman not behind her or in front of her. I want to be with someone who will be my best friend and my lover. Someone I can trust unconditionally.. And of course, I will be the same to you.I want my partner to be feminine, affectionate and passionate.Fidelity and Honesty are tops on my list of what I expect from my partner…
